hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa’eed that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was brought into his grave from the direction of the Qiblah, and he was placed in his grave gently

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِدْخَالِ الْمَيِّتِ الْقَبْرَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning placing the deceased in the grave
